message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product and I think you'd find it valuable. I'm offering it to you for $110.  What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product and am willing to pay up to $95 for it.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm looking for something closer to $105.  Would you be willing to meet me there?
Hello Alice, I've reviewed your latest offer and I'm willing to consider $100 for the product.
